skillTree.localised_description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% (when attacking)

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +80%

skillTree.localised_description: Although corrupt with change and frozen to the very core of their icy hearts, the Frost-Wyrms of the northern wastes are no less vicious for it.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +15 for Frost-Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Frost-Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Brooding upon his rocky throne, Throgg has pledged to fight all comers, with all the monsters of Troll Country at his side.

effects.description:
Public order: +5
	(local province)

Leadership: +12 for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Despite his aspirations as a ruler, Throgg is no tin tyrant hiding behind foolish legions.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +3 for "Copious Vomit"
Weapon strength: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The uncanny ability of quickly regenerating even the most grievous wounds; in due course, almost all will be healed.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Horrible Regeneration" for all Troll and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Norscan Trolls & Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Regeneration" for all Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Witlessly stupid, yet bone-crushingly powerful. Do not be deceived.

effects.description:
Melee Defence: +8 for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Ability: "Frenzy" for Troll and Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: "What the Gods gifted to me can be gifted to another. I will not be the one mind in a race of blunt, witless animals."

effects.description: Grants powerful retainer Ancillaries that can modify your units
Grants powerful retainer Ancillaries that can modify your units
Grants powerful retainer Ancillaries that can modify your units

skillTree.localised_description: "Von Carstein. The Everchosen. Dead men. Exalted men. In their skin they are all still men. This...will be the Age of the Beast."

effects.description:
Global recruitment duration: -2 turn for all Troll, Fimir and Skin Wolf units
	(factionwide)
Passive ability: "The Chilling Aura"

skillTree.localised_description: "HUUUURGGEHH!!! BLUUUURGGEHH!!! HUUUUUUUURRRRRGGGGGGGGGGEHH!!!"

effects.description: Ability: "Copious Vomit"

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Blink and you die.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

skillTree.localised_description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

effects.description: Ability: "Stand or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.

effects.description: Ability: "Fight or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +3%
Income from sacking settlements: +8%

skillTree.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Maybe it is the influence of the Dark Gods that has caused the populace to burgeon and proliferate beyond their natural bounds?

Growth: +20

skillTree.localised_description: The Troll King's horde control the wind-whipped hinterlands of Troll Country, and may yet extend their despoiling influence much further afield.

Hero recruit rank: +5 for Fimir Balefiends

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for all units
Recruit rank: +2 for all units
Recruit rank: +3 for all units

skillTree.localised_description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

skillTree.localised_description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Atypical of his savage, stupid kind, Throgg is possessed of a grim, malevolent cunning that raises him far above his peers.

effects.description: Attribute: Siege Attacker

Public order: +1
	(local province)
All units in Throgg's army are immune to all attrition

Chaos corruption: +2
	(local province)
